name: hail2u.net
description: There are articles, documents, and projects mainly about web development.
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://kyonagashima.com/)

scripts.precss: npm run format_css && npm run test_css && npm run clear
scripts.postcss: cp -rT src/css/ dist/css/ && rm dist/css/test.html && cp -rT tmp/ dist/css/ && cp tmp/main.min.css src/partial/main.css.mustache && npm run style_guide
scripts.deploy: cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message="Build" && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.format: npm run format_css && npm run format_js
scripts.postformat: git add bin/ lib/ src/css/ src/js/ && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message="Format files"
scripts.prejs: npm run format_js && npm run test_js && npm run clear
scripts.postjs: cp -rT src/js/ dist/js/ && cp -rT tmp/ dist/js/ && cp tmp/async.min.js src/partial/async.js.mustache && cp tmp/defer.min.js src/partial/defer.js.mustache
scripts.postpublish: npm run html && git add -- src/blosxom/plugins/state/ && npm run update_cache
scripts.rebuild: npm run css && npm run img && npm run js && npm run html && node bin/document.js --articles
scripts.postrebuild: git add -- src/blosxom/entries/themes/html/page src/partial/main.css.mustache src/partial/*.js.mustache && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message="Rebuild template files"
scripts.test: npm run test_css && npm run test_js
scripts.postupdate: npm run html && npm run update_cache
scripts.update_cache: git add -- src/blog/articles.json && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message="Update cache"
